text: Les Attaques is a commune in the Pas-de-Calais department in the Hauts-de- France region of France. ==Geography== A large farming and light industrial village located 4 miles (6 km) southeast of Calais, at the junction of the N43 and D248 roads. Both the A26 ‘autoroute des Anglaises’ and the Calais-St. Omer canal pass through the commune. ==Population== ==Sights== Underside of Les Attaques' four-way bridge * The church of St. Pierre, dating from the nineteenth century. * The nineteenth-century chateau Brûlé. * Vestiges of a Capuchin abbey. * A rare four-branch bridge ==See also== *Communes of the Pas- de-Calais department ==References== * INSEE commune file ==External links== * Les Attaques official website * Website of the football club of Les Attaques Category:Communes of Pas-de-Calais
title: Les Attaques
